Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls.mobile

Class Summary
MobileActionContext Action context for mobile operations
MobileBaseAction A base class for all mobile actions
MobileChangeAccountAction  
MobileConfirmAccountAction  
MobileConfirmAccountForm  
MobileConfirmPaymentAction Action used to confirm the payment
MobileConfirmPaymentForm Form used to confirm the payment
MobileDoPaymentAction Action used to perform a payment on mobile access
MobileDoPaymentForm Form used to perform a payment on mobile access
MobileHelper Contains helper methods for mobile access
MobileHomeAction Used to retrieve the home page on mobile access
MobileLoginAction Action used for login in mobile access
MobileLogoutAction Logout the user, redirecting to login
MobileViewPaymentsAction Action used to view payments
MobileViewPaymentsForm Form used to view payments
